package.name: Net_SMTP
package.summary: Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol
package.description: Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket class.

release.notes: - Correctly handle the case where the server's ESMTP response includes a SIZE keyword with no specific value.
- Don't enforce a maximum message size if the SIZE parameter is zero.

- The SMTP server's SIZE capability is now honored. - Improved support for SMTP authentication (LOGIN, PLAIN, CRAM-MD5, DIGEST-MD5). - Overhauled the server response parsing system. - Added optional debugging output (enabled via setDebug()). - A timeout value can now be specified for the socket connection.
Corrected an off-by-one bug that corrupted the list of ESMTP capabilities.
